thread.title: Aaron

author: Aaron
title: Aaron
text:
-Website is intuitive and had a great layout.
-I like the ability to generate DIY email templates and sort/categorize the candidates
-There is a really nice feature that allows a "pre-interview" which will help sort candidates. For instance, say a certain IT certification is a requirement, and the candidate applies for your position but does not have the cert --- he/she checks no --- it will sort that candidate and not put him at the top of your list. Nice auto screening process.
-Customer Service is great (Thank you for your help Sarah!)
